name: Yume-Iroiro
storyline:
Play as a male or female high school student from the first year to the 3rd year graduation ceremony.
Also enjoy 'Dream' Scenarios that take place in completely different settings.
summary: Yume-Iroiro is a dating simulation game in the style of Tokimeki Memorial and other games, but in this game at the beginning the player can choose to be a male or a female character.
